general.name: Full name
general.description_convention: Required for the client to benefit from application discounts. You have the option to skip this step
general.forgetPassword2_description: Enter your registered email below to receive password reset instructions
general.verifyEmail_description: A verification code has been sent to you. Enter code below
general.verifyCode_description: Enter the verification code sent to your email
general.err-pwd-2: At least one uppercase letter required
general.err-pwd-3: At least one lowercase letter required
general.err-pwd-4: At least one special character required: ! @ # $ % & *

hero_section.title: Book an appointment with your doctor
hero_section.description: Select your doctor, choose the date and time of your appointment and receive your notification.

whySection.title: Our mission is to simplify healthcare management. We believe that booking medical appointments should be simple, secure and accessible to everyone.
whySection.card-description-1: ASSISTINI connects you to verified doctors in your area, ensuring quick and reliable care. Whether it's a routine check-up or an emergency, we're here for you. Your health is our priority.
whySection.card-description-2: We work with licensed and experienced doctors who meet strict standards. With detailed profiles and patient reviews, you can trust ASSISTINI to provide you with the best care.

rdv_section.title: Why book an appointment with us?
rdv_section.description: With Assistini, book appointments online with your doctor differently

partner_section.title: Our partners
partner_section.description: Some of the latest and greatest projects from us here at assistini.

how.title: How ASSISTINI makes your life easier
how.opt-desp-1: In just a few seconds, find an available professional near you.
how.opt-desp-2: One time slot, one validation, and it's booked!
how.opt-desp-3: Read experience feedback to make the right choice.
how.opt-desp-4: An emergency? ASSISTINI guides you to the nearest help.

advantage.title: Accessible healthcare. For everyone. Everywhere.
advantage.sub-sub-title: ASSISTINI simplifies everyday healthcare. Convinced patients, available professionals, a smooth experience.
advantage.diff-desp-1: With detailed profiles and patient reviews, you can trust ASSISTINI to provide you with the best care.
advantage.diff-title-2: We connect you with over 3,000 reliable facilities. Whether it's a routine check-up or an emergency, your health is our priority.

edge.diff-desp-1: A dynamic platform used by thousands of patients daily.
edge.diff-desp-3: Solid expertise backed by experienced healthcare professionals.
edge.title: Excellence, our commitment
edge.sub-sub-title: ASSISTINI stands out with a network of verified doctors, smooth appointment booking and features designed for patients. Our cutting-edge technology ensures real-time, accurate results tailored to your needs. Excellence is our standard - because your health deserves the best.

experience.title: Optimize your healthcare experience
experience.badge-desp-1: We prioritize your needs, with features such as reviews, ratings and access to emergency services.
experience.badge-desp-2: From search to appointment booking, everything is designed to be simple, fast and frictionless.
experience.badge-desp-3: Every doctor on ASSISTINI is rigorously selected for their qualifications and experience.

effort.sub-sub-title: A smooth journey, an instant appointment
effort.card-desp-1: Find a healthcare professional by specialty, location or availability.
effort.card-desp-2: Check profiles, reviews and ratings to choose the practitioner best suited to your needs.
effort.card-desp-3: Book an appointment with one click or request a callback.
effort.card-desp-4: Go to the practice or opt for a teleconsultation.

unlock.title: Your care, made better.
unlock.sub-sub-title: Verified doctors, booking in a few clicks, transparent reviews: ASSISTINI simplifies healthcare.
unlock.box-desp-1: No more endless waiting or complicated forms.
unlock.box-desp-2: Authentic patient feedback. Make your decisions with confidence thanks to clear and reliable reviews.
unlock.box-desp-3: Smooth, stress-free payment. Enjoy a fast, protected and hassle-free payment experience.

app.title: Coming soon on Android and iOS. Reply
app.sub-title: The ASSISTINI app is coming soon!
app.sub-sub-title: Book appointments, consult your doctors and manage your health directly from your smartphone.

question.title: We have the answers
question.sub-sub-title: Easily find answers to the most frequently asked questions about our healthcare services.
question.acc-title-1: How to book an appointment with a doctor?
question.acc-title-2: How to book an online appointment?
question.acc-title-3: Can I cancel or modify my appointment?
question.acc-title-5: How to receive my invoice or proof?
question.acc-desp-1: Select the desired specialty, choose an available time slot and confirm. You will receive a reminder by SMS or email.
question.acc-desp-2: Once the appointment is confirmed, a secure link will be sent to you. Log in at the scheduled time from your phone or computer.
question.acc-desp-3: Yes, from your personal space, you can reschedule or cancel an appointment in a few clicks.
question.acc-desp-4: Absolutely. All your information is encrypted and secured, in compliance with current medical standards.
question.acc-desp-5: After each consultation, you automatically receive an invoice or proof by email and in your user space.

hero.title: Find a trusted doctor, in just a few clicks.
hero.desp: With ASSISTINI, easily access a network of qualified healthcare professionals, available anytime, anywhere.

offer.title: Take advantage of our exclusive healthcare offer
offer.desp: Join us and benefit from a simplified process, quality service and concrete savings. Don't miss this opportunity to start the year right.
